selector.label: Language
selector.description: Select your preferred language for the Plexcord.

location.label: Settings Location
location.description: Where to put the Plexcord settings section

winNativeTitleBar.label: Use Windows' native title bar instead of Discord's custom one

transparent.label: Enable window transparency
transparent.description: You need a theme that supports transparency or this will do nothing. WILL STOP THE WINDOW FROM BEING RESIZABLE!! Requires a full restart

winCtrlQ.label: Register Ctrl+Q as shortcut to close Discord (Alternative to Alt+F4)

donations.title: Donations
donations.subtitle: Thank you for donating!
donations.description: You can manage your perks at any time by messaging @mutanplex.

supportProject.title: Support the Project
supportProject.description: Please consider supporting the development of Plexcord by donating!

contributions.title: Contributions
contributions.subtitle: Thank you for contributing!
contributions.description: Since you've contributed to Plexcord you now have a cool new badge!

hintParts.prefix: Hint: You can change the position of this settings section in the

denied.title: Desktop Notification Permission Denied
denied.label: You have denied notification permissions. Desktop notifications will not work!

style.label: Notifications Style
style.description: Some plugins may show notifications to you. These come in two styles:
style.desktopDesc: Native Desktop notifications (like when you get a ping)
style.onlyWhenNotFocused: Only use Desktop notifications when Discord is not focused

missed.label: Missed Notifications Count
missed.description: When refocusing discord a notification will popup with how you missed

timeout.label: Notification Timeout
timeout.description: The amount of time (in seconds) that notifications will stay on screen before automatically disappearing

logLimit.label: Notification Log Limit
logLimit.description: The maximum number of notifications to keep in the log before old ones are removed. Set to {{disable}} to disable the notification log and {{unlimited}} to never automatically remove old notifications

restart.description: Restart now to apply new plugins and their settings
restart.following: The following plugins require a restart:
restart.fully: Some plugins require a restart to fully disable
restart.would: Would you like to restart now?

modal.noContributions: {{userName}} has not made any plugins. They likely {{contributedLink}} in other ways!

infoModal.description: Press the cog wheel or info icon to get more info on a plugin
infoModal.settingsInfo: Plugins with a cog wheel have settings you can modify!

error.infoRender: An error occured while rendering this plugin's custom Info Component

excluded.web: Plextron app and the Web version of Discord

search.noCriteria: No plugins meet the search criteria.

required.title: Required Plugins
required.this: This plugin is required for Plexcord to function.

dangerModal.title: DANGEROUS ACTION
dangerModal.disablePlugins: WARNING: You are about to disable {{pluginCount}} plugins!
dangerModal.enableBack: Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed? You can always enable them back later.
dangerModal.undone: This action cannet be undone. Are you sure?
dangerModal.resetDescription: You are about to reset all settings for {{pluginName}} to their default values.
dangerModal.disable: You are about to disable {{enabledPlugins}} plugins!
dangerModal.resetText: If you are certain you want to proceed, click {{confirmReset}}. Otherwise, click {{cancel}}.

pluginModal.noSettings: There are no settings for this plugin.

description.memberListDecorators: API to add decorators to member list (both in servers and DMs)
description.messageAccessories: API to add accessories to messages
description.messageDecorations: API to add decorations to messages
description.chatInputButtons: API to add buttons to the chat input
description.commands: API required by anything that uses commands
description.contextMenu: API for adding/removing items to/from context menus.
description.dynamicImageModal: Allows you to omit either width or height when opening an image modal
description.messageEvents: API required by anything using message events
description.messagePopover: API to add buttons to message popovers
description.messageUpdater: API for updating and re-rendering messages
description.nicknameIcons: API to add icons to the nickname, in profiles
description.serverList: API required for plugins that modify the server list
description.userSettings: Patches Discord's UserSettings to expose their group and name.

badges.description: API to add badges to users

modal.title: Plexcord Donor
modal.special: This Badge is a special perk for Plexcord Donors
modal.description: Please consider supporting the development of Plexcord by becoming a donor. It would mean a lot!

settings.name: Settings
settings.description: Adds Settings UI and debug info

language.label: Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for Plexcord.

settingsLocation.label: Settings Location
settingsLocation.description: Determines where the Plexcord settings section will be located.

noTrack.name: NoTrack
noTrack.description: Disable Discord's tracking (analytics/'science'), metrics and Sentry crash reporting

disableAnalytics.label: Disable Analytics
disableAnalytics.description: Disable Discord's tracking (analytics/'science'), metrics and Sentry crash reporting

supportHelper.name: Support Helper
supportHelper.description: Helps us provide support to you

outdated.title: Hold on!
outdated.body: You are using an outdated version of Plexcord! Chances are, your issue is already fixed.
outdated.footer: Please first update before asking for support!

button.secondaryConfirm: I know what I'm doing or I can't update

updater.title: Hold on!
updater.body: You are using an externally updated Plexcord version, which we do not provide support for!
updater.footer: Please either switch to an {{officially}}, or contact your package maintainer for support instead.

custom.title: Hold on!
custom.header: You are using a custom build of Plexcord, which we do not provide support for!
custom.body: We only provide support for {{officialBuild}}. Either {{switch}} or figure your issue out yourself.
custom.footer: You will be banned from receiving support if you ignore this rule.

dm.warning: Please do not private message Plexcord plugin developers for support!{{br}}Instead, you can join the {{support}} server and use the Plexcord support channel: {{channel}}

fullPatch.label: Full Patch
fullPatch.description: Paste your full JSON patch here to fill in the fields

error.noMatch: No match found. This module may be lazy loaded?
error.multipleMatch: Multiple matches found. Please use a more specific search pattern.

cheatSheet.title: Cheat Sheet
cheatSheet.identifiers: Special regex escape sequence that matches identifiers (varnames, classnames, etc.)
cheatSheet.beforeMatch: Insert the substring before the match
cheatSheet.afterMatch: Insert the substring after the match

replacementEval.label: Treat as Function
replacementEval.description: 'replacement' will be evaled if this is toggled

sync.title: Backup & Restore
sync.warningText: Importing a settings file will overwrite your current settings.
sync.description: You can import and export your Plexcord settings as a JSON file. This allows you to easily transfer your settings to another device, or recover your settings after reinstalling Plexcord or Discord.
sync.successful: Settings successfully imported. Restart to apply changes!

cloud.title: Settings Sync
cloud.description: Sync your settings with the cloud. This allows for easy synchronization across multiple devices with minimal effort.
cloud.updated: Your settings have been updated! Click here to restart to fully apply changes!
cloud.reauth: We've noticed you have cloud integrations enabled in another client! Due to limitations, you will need to re-authenticate to continue using them. Click here to go to the settings page to do so!

error.connect: Cloud sync was disabled because this account isn't connected to the Plexcord Cloud App. You can enable it again by connecting this account in Cloud Settings. (note: it will store your preferences separately)
error.noSettings: There are no settings in the cloud.
error.uptodate: Your settings are up to date.
error.localNewer: Your local settings are newer than the cloud ones.

returned.to: Could not synchronize settings to cloud (API returned {{status}}).
returned.from: Could not synchronize settings from the cloud (API returned {{status}}).

synchronize.to: Could not synchronize settings to cloud ({{error}}).
synchronize.from: Could not synchronize settings from the cloud ({{error}}).

notification.title: Cloud Integration
notification.host: {{host}} has been added to the whitelist. Please restart the app for the changes to take effect.

erase.failed: Failed to erase all data (API {{status}} returned), please contact support.

button.fromDescription: This will overwrite your local settings with the ones on the cloud. Use wisely!

erase.title: Are you sure?
erase.body: Once your data is erased, we cannot recover it. There's no going back!

cloud.overview: Plexcord comes with a cloud integration that adds goodies like settings sync across devices. It {{privacy}}, and the {{source}} is AGPL 3.0 licensed so you can host it yourself.
cloud.authorization: This will request authorization if you have not yet set up cloud integrations.

backend.title: Backend URL
backend.description: Which backend to use when using cloud integrations.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: You can find the latest changes and updates to Plexcord here.
changelog.internet: Make sure you have an internet connection and try again.
changelog.noCommit: No commits available ahead of your current version. Click 'Fetch from Repository' to check for new changes.
changelog.previous: Previous update sessions with their commit history and plugin changes.

modal.description: View the most recent changes to Plexcord. This fetches commits directly from the repository to show you what's new.

toast.already: Already up to date with repository
toast.local: Repository is up to date with your local copy

clear.title: Clear All Logs
clear.body: Are you sure you would like to clear all logs? This can't be undone.

log.title: Clear Log
log.body: Are you sure you would like to clear this log? This can't be undone.

changelog.following: The following plugins have been added in recent updates:

csp.restart: A restart is required to apply this change

blocked.disallowed: Some images, styles, or fonts were blocked because they come from disallowed domains.
blocked.recommended: It is highly recommended to move them to GitHub or Imgur. But you may also allow domains if you fully trust them.
blocked.afterAllow: After allowing a domain, you have to fully close (from tray / task manager) and restart {{platform}} to apply the change.

imgur.direct: Imgur links should be direct links in the form of {{etc}}
imgur.copy: To obtain a direct link, right-click the image and select 'Copy image address'.

wants.detail: Unless you recognise and fully trust {{domain}}, you should cancel this request!
wants.restart: You will have to fully close and restart {{appName}} for the changes to take effect.
wants.content: The following types of content will be allowed to load from {{domain}}:
wants.understand: I fully trust {{domain}} and understand the risks of allowing connections to it.
wants.title: Host Permissions

themes.title: Themes

error.userscript: Themes are not supported on the Userscript!
error.stylus: You can istead install themes with the {{stylus}}!

themes.download: If using the BD site, click on 'Download' and place the downloaded .theme.css file into your themes folder.

external.title: External Themes
external.security: For security reasons, loading resources (styles, fonts, images, ...) from most sites is blocked.
external.host: Make sure all your assets are hosted on GitHub, GitLab, Codeberg, Imgur, Discord or Google Fonts.

advanced.warning: This section is for advanced users. If you are having difficulties using it, use the Local Themes tab instead.
advanced.paste: Paste links to css files here
advanced.prefix: You can prefix lines with @light or @dark to toggle them based on your Discord theme
advanced.direct: Make sure to use direct links to files (raw or github.io)!

updater.title: Updater

github.local: Your local copy has more recent commits. Please stash or reset them.

error.check: Failed to check updates. Check the console for more info
error.title: Oops!
error.tryAgain: An unknown error occurred. Please try again or see the console for more info.
error.command: Command {{path}} not found. Please install it and try again.
error.code: Code {{code}}. See the console for more info.
error.render: Failed to render the {{tab}} tab. If this issue persists, try using the installer to reinstall!
error.failed: That also failed :( Try updating or re-installing with the installer!

updater.click: Click here to view the update

successful.title: Update Success!
successful.body: Successfully updated. Restart now to apply the changes?

automatically.label: Automatically update
automatically.description: Automatically update Plexcord without confirmation prompt

notify.label: Get notified when an automatic update completes
notify.description: Shows a notification when Plexcord automatically updates

error.title: Oh no!
error.render: An error occurred while rendering this Component. More info can be found below and in your console.

componentFailed.message: Uh Oh! Failed to render this Page. However, there is an update available that might fix it. Would you like to update and restart now?

error.execute: An Error occurred while executing command '{{command}}'

log.title: Notification Log
log.permamently: This will permamently remove {{count}} notification{{s}}. This action cannot be undone.

error.render: Failed to render {{key}} Member List Decorator

accountPanelServerProfile.name: AccountPanelServerProfile
accountPanelServerProfile.description: Right click your account panel in the bottom left to view your profile in the current server

prioritize.label: Prioritize Server Profile
prioritize.description: Prioritize Server Profile when left clicking your account panel

allCallTimers.name: AllCallTimers
allCallTimers.description: Shows call timers in all voice calls

showWithoutHover.label: Show Without Hover
showWithoutHover.description: Always show the timer without needing to hover

showRoleColor.label: Show Role Color
showRoleColor.description: Display in the user’s role color (if the ShowRoleColor plugin is enabled)

watchLargeGuilds.label: Watch Large Guilds
watchLargeGuilds.description: Track users in large guilds. This may cause lag if you're in a lot of large guilds with active voice users. Tested with up to 2000 active voice users with no issues.

fixUI.label: UI Fix
fixUI.description: In some cases the timer may break the user interface. Enable this option to fix it.

altKrispSwitch.name: AltKrispSwitch
altKrispSwitch.description: Makes the Noise Suppression Popout switch between None and Krisp instead of Krisp and Standard

alwaysAnimate.name: AlwaysAnimate
alwaysAnimate.description: Animates anything that can be animated

alwaysExpandProfile.name: AlwaysExpandProfile
alwaysExpandProfile.description: Always expands profile popouts to the full modal

alwaysExpandRoles.name: AlwaysExpandRoles
alwaysExpandRoles.description: Always expands role lists in profile popouts

alwaysTrust.name: AlwaysTrust
alwaysTrust.description: Removes the annoying untrusted domain and suspicious file popup

domain.label: Domain
domain.description: Remove the untrusted domain popup when opening links

file.label: File
file.description: Remove the 'Potentially Dangerous Download' popup when opening links

amITyping.name: AmITyping
amITyping.description: Shows you if other people can see you typing.

anonymiseByDefault.label: Anonymise by default
anonymiseByDefault.description: Anonymise file names by default. You can disable this in the upload popup if needed.

spoilerMessages.label: Spoiler Messages
spoilerMessages.description: Anonymise file names that are marked as spoilers.

spoiler.toggle: Dosyalarınız için Spoiler'ınızı açıp kapatın (varsayılan açık)

appleMusic.name: AppleMusicRichPresence
appleMusic.description: Discord rich presence for your Apple Music!
appleMusic.about: For the customizable activity format strings, you can use several special strings to include track data in activities! {{name}} is replaced with the track name; {{artist}} is replaced with the artist(s)' name(s); and {{album}} is replaced with the album name.

statusDisplayType.label: Status Display Type
statusDisplayType.description: Show the track / artist name in the member list

enableTimestamps.label: Enable Timestamps
enableTimestamps.description: Whether or not to enable timestamps

enableButtons.label: Enable Buttons
enableButtons.description: Whether or not to enable buttons

largeTextString.label: Large Text String
largeTextString.description: Activity assets large text format string

smallTextString.label: Small Text String
smallTextString.description: Activity assets small text format string

arRpc.name: WebRichPresence(arRPC)
arRpc.description: Client plugin for arRPC to enable RPC on Discord Web (experimental)

use.title: How to use arRPC
use.enable: {{link}} to get the server running, and then enable the plugin.
use.link: Follow the instructions in the GitHub repo

toast.failed: Failed to connect to arRPC, is it running?

atSomeone.name: AtSomeone
atSomeone.description: With @someone you can mention someone randomly

bannersEverywhere.name: BannersEverywhere
bannersEverywhere.description: Displays banners in the member list

betterActivities.name: BetterActivities
betterActivities.description: Shows activity icons in the member list and allows showing all activities

memberList.label: Member List
memberList.description: Show activity icons in the member list

specialFirst.label: Special First
specialFirst.description: Show special activities first (Currently Spotify and Twitch)

removeGameActivityStatus.label: Remove 'Game Activity' Status
removeGameActivityStatus.description: Remove game activity icon and status

userPopout.label: User Popout
userPopout.description: Show all activities in the profile popout/sidebar

betterBanReasons.name: BetterBanReasons
betterBanReasons.description: Create custom reasons to use in the Discord ban modal, and/or show a text input by default instead of the options.

isTextInputDefault.label: Is Text Input Default
isTextInputDefault.description: Shows a text input instead of a select menu by default. (Equivalent to clicking the 'Other' option)

betterBanReasons.title: Reasons

betterBlockedUsers.name: BetterBlockedUsers
betterBlockedUsers.description: Allows you to search in blocked users list and makes names selectable in settings.

betterCommands.name: BetterCommands
betterCommands.description: Enhances the command system with miscellaneous improvements.

autoFillArguments.label: Auto Fill Arguments
autoFillArguments.description: Automatically fill command with all arguments instead of just required ones

allowNewlinesInCommands.label: Allow Newlines in Commands
allowNewlinesInCommands.description: Allow newlines in command inputs (Shift + Enter)

refresh.user: specific user to try and refresh
refresh.failed: Failed to refresh commands. Check the console for details.

betterFolders.name: BetterFolders
betterFolders.description: Shows server folders on dedicated sidebar and adds folder related improvements

sidebar.label: Sidebar
sidebar.description: Display servers from folder on dedicated sidebar

closeAllFolders.label: Close All Folders
closeAllFolders.description: Close all folders when selecting a server not in a folder

closeAllHomeButton.label: Close All Home Button
closeAllHomeButton.description: Close all folders when clicking on the home button

closeOthers.label: Close Others
closeOthers.description: Close other folders when opening a folder

closeServerFolder.label: Close Server Folder
closeServerFolder.description: Close folder when selecting a server in that folder

forceOpen.label: Force Open
forceOpen.description: Force a folder to open when switching to a server of that folder

keepIcons.label: Keep Icons
keepIcons.description: Keep showing guild icons in the primary guild bar folder when it's open in the BetterFolders sidebar

showFolderIcon.label: Show Folder Icon
showFolderIcon.description: Show the folder icon above the folder guilds in the BetterFolders sidebar
showFolderIcon.moreThanOne: When more than one folder is expanded

betterGifAltText.name: BetterGifAltText
betterGifAltText.description: Change GIF alt text from simply being 'GIF' to containing the gif tags / filename

betterGifPicker.name: BetterGifPicker
betterGifPicker.description: Makes the gif picker open the favourite category by default

betterInvites.name: BetterInvites
betterInvites.description: See invites expiration date, view inviter profile and preview discoverable servers before joining by clicking their name

betterNotesBox.name: BetterNotesBox
betterNotesBox.description: Hide notes or disable spellcheck (Configure in settings!!)

hide.label: Hide notes
hide.description: Hide the notes box in user popouts

betterPlusReacts.name: BetterPlusReacts
betterPlusReacts.description: The amount of plus before :emoji: is the message to add it to

betterQuickReact.name: BetterQuickReact
betterQuickReact.description: Improves the quick react buttons in the message context menu.

frequentEmojis.label: Frequent Emojis
frequentEmojis.description: Use frequently used emojis instead of favourite emojis

rows.label: Rows
rows.description: Rows of quick reactions to display

columns.label: Columns
columns.description: Columns of quick reactions to display

compactMode.label: Compact Mode
compactMode.description: Scales the buttons to 75% of their original scale, whilst increasing the inner emoji to 125% scale. Emojis will be 93.75% of the original size. Recommended to have a minimum of 5 columns

scroll.label: Scroll
scroll.description: Enable scrolling the list of emojis

betterRoleContext.name: BetterRoleContext
betterRoleContext.description: Adds options to copy role color / edit role / view role icon when right clicking roles in the user profile

roleIconFileFormat.label: Role Icon File Format
roleIconFileFormat.description: File format to use when viewing role icons

betterRoleDot.name: BetterRoleDot
betterRoleDot.description: Copy role colour on RoleDot (accessibility setting) click. Also allows using both RoleDot and coloured names simultaneously.

bothStyles.label: Both Styles
bothStyles.description: Show both role dot and coloured names

copyRoleColorInProfilePopout.label: Copy Role Color in Profile Popout
copyRoleColorInProfilePopout.description: Allow click on role dot in profile popout to copy role color

betterSessions.name: BetterSessions
betterSessions.description: Enhances the sessions (devices) menu. Allows you to view exact timestamps, give each session a custom name, and receive notifications about new sessions.

backgroundCheck.label: Background Check
backgroundCheck.description: Check for new sessions in the background, and display notifications when they are detected

checkInterval.label: Check Interval
checkInterval.description: How often to check for new sessions in the background (if enabled), in minutes

organizeMenu.label: Organize Menu
organizeMenu.description: Organizes the settings cog context menu into categories

eagerLoad.label: Eager Load
eagerLoad.description: Removes the loading delay when opening the menu for the first time

alert.title: Restart required
alert.restart: You have changed settings that require a restart.

betterUploadButton.name: BetterUploadButton
betterUploadButton.description: Upload with a single click, open menu with right click

bigFileUpload.name: BigFileUpload
bigFileUpload.description: Bypass Discord's upload limit by uploading files using the 'Upload a Big File' button or /fileupload and they'll get uploaded as links into chat via file uploaders.

toast.unable: **Unable to upload file.** Check the console for more info. -# This is likely an issue with your network connection, firewall, or VPN.

import.error: Error importing ShareX config. Check console for details.

required.url: Custom uploader request URL is required.
required.fileForm: Custom uploader file form name is required.
required.json: Custom uploader URL (JSON path) is required.

limit.title: Upload Limit Bypass
limit.description: Select the external file uploader service to be used to bypass the upload limit.

autoSend.label: Auto-Send Uploads To Chat
autoSend.description: Whether to automatically send the links with the uploaded files to chat instead of just pasting them into the chatbox.

autoMask.label: Auto-Mask Links
autoMask.description: Whether to mask the link to match the original filename.

goFile.title: GoFile Token (optional)
goFile.description: Insert your personal GoFile account's token to save all uploads to your GoFile account.

catbox.title: Catbox User hash (optional)
catbox.description: Insert your personal Catbox account's hash to save all uploads to your Catbox account.

litterBox.title: File Expiration Time
litterBox.description: Select how long it should take for your uploads to expire and get deleted.

autoSend.label: Auto-Send
autoSend.description: Automatically send uploaded file links to chat.

litterboxTime.label: Litterbox Time
litterboxTime.description: Duration for files on Litterbox before they are deleted

customUploaderRequestURL.label: Custom Uploader Request URL
customUploaderRequestURL.description: Request URL of your custom uploader

customUploaderFileFormName.label: Custom Uploader File Form Name
customUploaderFileFormName.description: File form name of your custom uploader

customUploaderResponseType.label: Custom Uploader Response Type
customUploaderResponseType.description: Response type of your custom uploader

customUploaderURL.label: Custom Uploader URL
customUploaderURL.description: URL (JSON path) for the custom uploader

customUploaderThumbnail.label: Custom Uploader Thumbnail URL
customUploaderThumbnail.description: Thumbnail URL (JSON path) for the custom uploader

customUploaderHeaders.label: Custom Uploader Headers
customUploaderHeaders.description: Headers for the custom uploader (JSON string)

customUploaderArgs.label: Custom Uploader Arguments
customUploaderArgs.description: Arguments for the custom uploader (JSON string)

biggerStreamPreview.name: BiggerStreamPreview
biggerStreamPreview.description: This plugin allows you to enlarge stream previews

blockKeywords.name: BlockKeywords
blockKeywords.description: Blocks messages containing specific user-defined keywords, as if the user sending them was blocked.

blockedWords.label: Blocked Words
blockedWords.description: Comma-separated list of words to block

useRegex.label: Use Regex
useRegex.description: Use each value as a regular expression when checking message content (advanced)

caseSensitive.label: Case Sensitive
caseSensitive.description: Whether to use a case sensitive search or not

blurNSFW.name: BlurNSFW
blurNSFW.description: Blur attachments in NSFW channels until hovered

blurAllChannels.label: Blur All Channels
blurAllChannels.description: Blur attachments in all channels (not just NSFW)

bypassStatus.name: BypassStatus
bypassStatus.description: Still get notifications from specific sources when in do not disturb mode. Right-click on users/channels/guilds to set them to bypass do not disturb mode.

guilds.label: Guilds
guilds.description: Guilds to let bypass (notified when pinged anywhere in guild)

channels.label: Channels
channels.description: Channels to let bypass (notified when pinged in that channel)

users.label: Users
users.description: Users to let bypass (notified for all messages sent in DMs)

allowOutsideOfDms.label: Allow Outside of DMs
allowOutsideOfDms.description: Allow selected users to bypass status outside of DMs too (acts like a channel/guild bypass, but it's for all messages sent by the selected users)

notificationSound.label: Notification Sound
notificationSound.description: Whether the notification sound should be played

cakeDay.name: CakeDay
cakeDay.description: Track and display user birthdays with cake icons

chat.label: Chat
chat.description: Show cake icons next to usernames in chat

memberList.label: Member List
memberList.description: Show cake icons in member list

profileBadge.label: Profile Badge
profileBadge.description: Show cake badge in user profile

toast.invalid: Invalid birthday format! Only DD/MM is accepted.

modal.title: Set Birthday for {{username}}
modal.description: Enter the birthday in DD/MM format (e.g. 25/12)
modal.savedDesc: No birthdays saved yet. Right-click on users to add their birthdays!

format.label: Format
format.description: The timer format. This can be any valid moment.js format

channelBadges.name: ChannelBadges
channelBadges.description: Adds badges to channels based on their type

badge.nsfw: This channel is marked as NSFW.
badge.rules: This channel is the server rules channel.

oneBadgePerChannel.label: One Badge Per Channel
oneBadgePerChannel.description: Show only one badge per channel

tooltip.nsfw: This channel is marked as NSFW.

channelTabs.name: ChannelTabs
channelTabs.description: Group your commonly visited channels in tabs, like a browser

bookmark.label: Bookmark
bookmark.noBookmarks: You have no bookmarks. You can add an open tab or hide this by right clicking it

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.description: Deleting a bookmark folder will also delete all bookmarks within it.

onStartup.label: On Startup
onStartup.description: What to do with tabs on startup
onStartup.nothing: Do nothing (open on the friends tab)
onStartup.open: Open on a specific set of tabs

tabSet.label: Tab Set
tabSet.description: Select which tabs to open at startup

noPomeloNames.label: No Pomelo Names
noPomeloNames.description: Use display names instead of usernames for DM's

widerTabsAndBookmarks.label: Wider Tabs and Bookmarks
widerTabsAndBookmarks.description: Extend the length of tabs and bookmarks for larger monitors

switchToExistingTab.label: Switch to Existing Tab
switchToExistingTab.description: Switch to tab if it already exists for the channel you're navigating to

createNewTabIfNotExists.label: Create New Tab If Not Exists
createNewTabIfNotExists.description: Create a new tab if one doesn't exist for the channel you're navigating to

enableRapidNavigation.label: Enable Rapid Navigation
enableRapidNavigation.description: Enable rapid navigation behavior - quickly navigating between channels will replace the current tab instead of creating new ones

rapidNavigationThreshold.label: Rapid Navigation Threshold
rapidNavigationThreshold.description: Time window (in milliseconds) for rapid navigation. Within this time, new channels replace the current tab instead of creating new ones.

hotkeyCount.label: Hotkey Count
hotkeyCount.description: Number of tabs accessible via keyboard shortcuts

toast.notRestoring: Not restoring tabs as KeepCurrentChannel is enabled

characterCounter.name: CharacterCounter
characterCounter.description: Displays a character counter in the message box

colorEffects.label: Color Effects
colorEffects.description: Turn on or off color effects for getting close to the character limit

cleanChannelName.name: CleanChannelName
cleanChannelName.description: Remove all emoji and decor shit from channel names

clearURLs.name: ClearURLs
clearURLs.description: Automatically removes tracking elements from URLs you send

clientSideBlock.name: ClientSideBlock
clientSideBlock.description: Allows you to locally hide almost all content from any user

usersToBlock.label: Users to Block
usersToBlock.description: User IDs seperated by a comma and a space

hideBlockedUsers.label: Hide Blocked Users
hideBlockedUsers.description: Should blocked users should also be hidden everywhere

hideBlockedMessages.label: Hide Blocked Messages
hideBlockedMessages.description: Should messages from blocked users should be hidden fully (same as the old noblockedmessages plugin)

hideEmptyRoles.label: Hide Empty Roles
hideEmptyRoles.description: Should role headers be hidden if all of their members are blocked

blockedReplyDisplay.label: Blocked Reply Display
blockedReplyDisplay.description: What should display instead of the message when someone replies to someone you have hidden
blockedReplyDisplay.displayText: Display text saying a hidden message was replied to

guildBlackList.label: Guild Blacklist
guildBlackList.description: Guild ids to disable functionality in

guildWhiteList.label: Guild Whitelist
guildWhiteList.description: Guild ids to enable functionality in

clientTheme.name: ClientTheme
clientTheme.description: Recreation of the old client theme experiment. Add a color to your Discord client theme
clientTheme.title: Theme Color
clientTheme.add: Add a color to your Discord client theme

modal.title: Your theme won't look good!
modal.contrast: Selected color won't contrast well with text

clipsEnhancements.name: ClipsEnhancements
clipsEnhancements.description: Add more Clip FPS and duration options, plus RPC tagging!

richPresenceTagging.label: Rich Presence Tagging
richPresenceTagging.description: When should clips be tagged with the current Rich Presence?
richPresenceTagging.only: Only when beginning or end of activity name matches

clipsLink.label: Clips Link
clipsLink.link: Change FPS and duration options in Clips settings!

colorSighted.name: ColorSighted
colorSighted.description: Removes the colorblind-friendly icons from statuses, just like 2015-2017 Discord

commandPalette.name: CommandPalette
commandPalette.description: Allows you to navigate the UI with a keyboard.

hotkey.label: Hotkey
hotkey.description: The hotkey to open the command palette

allowMouseControl.label: Allow Mouse Control
allowMouseControl.description: Allow the mouse to control the command palette.

disableSpotifyLogger.label: Disable Spotify Logger
disableSpotifyLogger.description: Disable the Spotify logger, which leaks account information and access token

whitelistedLoggers.label: Whitelisted Loggers
whitelistedLoggers.description: Semi colon separated list of loggers to allow even if others are hidden

allowLevel.label: Allow Level
allowLevel.description: Always allow loggers of these types

consoleShortcuts.name: Console Shortcuts
consoleShortcuts.description: Adds shorter Aliases for many things on the window. Run `shortcutList` for a list.

contentWarning.name: ContentWarning
contentWarning.description: Allows you to specify certain trigger words that will be blurred by default. Clicking on the blurred content will reveal it.

copyEmojiMarkdown.name: CopyEmojiMarkdown
copyEmojiMarkdown.description: Allows you to copy emojis as formatted string (<a:blob_pwease:1402403381900742737>)

copyUnicode.label: Copy Unicode
copyUnicode.description: Copy the raw unicode character instead of :name: for default emojis (👽)

copyFileContents.name: CopyFileContents
copyFileContents.description: Adds a button to text file attachments to copy their contents

copyStatusUrls.name: CopyStatusUrls
copyStatusUrls.description: Copy the users status url when you right-click it

toast.error: Error copying URL, check console for more info

copyStickerLinks.name: CopyStickerLinks
copyStickerLinks.description: Adds the ability to copy & open Sticker links

copyUserMention.name: CopyUserMention
copyUserMention.description: Adds a button to copy user's mention on the user context menu, works best with ValidUser.

copyUserURLs.name: CopyUserURLs
copyUserURLs.description: Adds a 'Copy User URL' option to the user context menu.
